TextView.android:text: In this event the participants will be given topics five minutes prior to the event where he or she will have to speak for a minute on the given topic.

Rules for IN-GLOT(Extempore) :
 1. The Participants will have to register themselves at the event venue.
 2. All the participants will be given a topic 15 min prior to the commencement of the competition.
 3. The participants will be speaking on their specified topic for not more than one minute.
 4. Any kind of misbehavior or inappropriate usage of words will lead to disqualification of the participant.
 Judging Criteria:
 1. The judging will be based on the best speaker of the event.
 2. Merit certificates will be awarded to the best speaker.
 3. The decision of the judge is sole and discretionary.\m
*Note: Any kind of changes regarding the events will be solely the decision of the organizers on the basis of the situation and cannot be questioned.
